jcr:content.jcr:title: Microsoft Translator
jcr:content.description: Instantly translate your site into any of more than 40 languages. Machine Translation is integrated into Social Communities and automatic translation workflows. Keep translated content up-to-date automatically. Customize your translation system to your organizationâ€™s terminology and style. A limited trial is included, you may upgrade to a full-featured subscription at any time.
jcr:content.descriptionExtended: Microsoft Translator provides automatic translation of text into a specified language. It is a state-of-the-art statistical machine translation system, translating between any of more than 40 languages, and powering billions of translations every day.
